title: La Fille du Régiment
subtitle: Opera poster design
excerpt: Poster for the opera “La Fille du Régiment”.

description.text: During my studies at EASD València I had the opportunity to learn from renewed valencian designers in various workshops. In this case it was a three day workshop with Ibán Ramón, during which we designed, in teams of four, a poster for the opera “La Fille du Régiment”.
This opera was interpreted by students of ESAD València and the posters made in this workshop were used to promote it.
